categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic divisions

nodes.text: The 44th Division, or Rostu's Renegades was a Republic military force that was active during the Clone Wars, and it was commanded by Major Nick Rostu. Unlike many other pure clone or conscripted forces, this division was very mixed in its personnel, meaning it had both clone troopers and other species in the division. The 44th had distinguished actions on multiple fronts including Bassadro, Ando, Atraken and many others.
